title: Enterprise IT Infrastructure Simulation (Flagship Homelab)
summary: A comprehensive homelab environment simulating a small-to-midsize organization with integrated identity, networking, and automation.
covers: Active Directory domain with structured OUs and user lifecycle workflows
Segmented network design with firewall rules
Automation for onboarding and administrative tasks
importance: This flagship project demonstrates my ability to design and maintain complex IT infrastructure. It shows I understand how enterprise systems connect, how to automate repetitive tasks, and how to build resilient environments that support business operations.
